h2_title: Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang
content: If you find yourself having trouble with the **Stone Vanguard** , it is possible to get some assistance from the most unlikely source: Another Yaoguai King found in the same boss arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stone_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Stone Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
If you find yourself having trouble with the **Stone Vanguard** , it is possible to get some assistance from the most unlikely source: Another Yaoguai King found in the same boss arena.
